name: PiglinEntityHelper
description: The PiglinEntityHelper class provides specialized access to piglin entities in Minecraft, offering detailed insight into their activities, behaviors, and combat states.
overview:
This class extends the base functionality of AbstractPiglinEntityHelper with piglin-specific activity detection that is essential for understanding piglin AI behavior, bartering interactions, and combat patterns.

Piglins are complex hostile mobs that exhibit unique behaviors like bartering with players, dancing to music, admiring items, and switching between melee and ranged combat. This helper class allows scripters to monitor these behavioral states and create sophisticated piglin interaction systems, automated bartering monitors, combat analysis tools, and behavioral research utilities.

methods.name: isWandering
methods.description: Checks if the piglin is currently in a wandering state.

methods.name: isDancing
methods.description: Checks if the piglin is dancing (usually triggered by nearby music sources). This represents a safe state.

methods.name: isAdmiring
methods.description: Checks if the piglin is admiring a gold item. This state is valuable for bartering operations.

methods.name: isMeleeAttacking
methods.description: Checks if the piglin is currently performing a melee attack.

methods.name: isChargingCrossbow
methods.description: Checks if the piglin is currently charging a crossbow.

methods.name: hasCrossbowReady
methods.description: Checks if the piglin has a crossbow fully charged and ready to fire.
